lead_paragraph: The Indians expect outfielder Shin-Soo Choo to be exempted from military service after leading South Korea to a gold medal in the Asian Games, and the team is hoping to keep Choo in a Cleveland uniform for as long as possible
snippet: The Indians expect outfielder Shin-Soo Choo to be exempted from military service after leading South Korea to a gold medal in the Asian Games, and the team is hoping to keep Choo in a Cleveland uniform for as long as possible
